body_html: I did, although the compilation time was huge (something like 18 hours). However, I do have some problems with using it in another C++ project (check this StackOverflow post), but I don't know whether this is related to how I compiled it. I was able to successfully run some provided example scripts.

body: I did, although the compilation time was huge (something like 18 hours). However, I do have some problems with using it in another C++ project (check this [StackOverflow post](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49496758/cannot-link-to-self-built-tensorflow-on-windows-with-visual-studio-when-wholear)), but I don't know whether this is related to how I compiled it. I was able to successfully run some provided example scripts.
